description: An array defining breaks in the axis, the sections defined will be left out and all the points shifted closer to each other.

productdesc.value: Requires that the broken-axis.js module is loaded.

children.name: breakSize
children.description: A number indicating how much space should be left between the start and the end of the break. The break size is given in axis units, so for instance on a datetime axis, a break size of 3600000 would indicate the equivalent of an hour.

children.name: repeat
children.description: Defines an interval after which the break appears again. By default the breaks do not repeat.
